DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , multicenter study evaluate efficacy safety abciximab , anti-platelet therapy , patient undergo high risk coronary angioplasty . The primary outcome study include follow : number death cause , myocardial infarction recurrent ischemic event require urgent intervention ( e.g. , repeat angioplasty , coronary artery bypass surgery , intracoronary stent placement , intra-aortic balloon pump ) . Patients receive abciximab bolus , abciximab bolus plus infusion , placebo .
